summary: Riverwood Enhanced - BETA. Preview the changes for Riverwood Enhanced before they go live!
descriptionHtml:
[color=RED]CURRENT STATUS:[/color] BETA TESTING REVISION 15. THIS IS NOT A FINAL VERSION.

This is a private test of new features of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8193]Riverwood Enhanced[/url].
This version lets you preview upcoming changes before they are finalized, so there may be bugs. Please report anything wrong in the comments!

[color=RED]Non-BETA version[/color] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8193]CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD NON-BETA VERSION[/url] [color=RED]<<<<<<<<<<<<<<[/color]
[color=cyan]If you do not want to participate in the beta, please download the file above instead.[/color]

HISTORY
[b]09/18/12[/b]: R15 beta 1 added for download.
[b]04/22/12[/b]: Thanks to those who helped test R13 beta. The beta is currently over for now. Revision 13 can be found on the main mod page [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8193]here[/url].
[b]04/14/12[/b]: R13 beta 3 added for download.
[b]04/08/12[/b]: R13 beta 2 added for download.
[b]03/29/12[/b]: R13 beta 1 added for download.
[b]03/27/12[/b]: Thanks to those who helped test R12.1. The beta is currently over for now, and I will add the changes to the next version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8193]Riverwood Enhanced[/url] soon.
[b]03/26/12[/b]: R12.1 added for download.
New beta versions will be added here in the future.
author: Sam
